faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Will perspective recording in Memory Capsule use a lot of storage space?
faq.a1: Memory Capsule uses intelligent compression technology to optimize how perspectives are stored. You can also choose to store content in the cloud to reduce local storage pressure. Pro and Family plan users enjoy unlimited cloud storage space.
faq.q2: Does perspective recording consume a lot of battery?
faq.a2: We've implemented low-power mode to optimize battery consumption. You can select different recording qualities in settings to find the right balance for you. The app also supports intelligent recording, automatically adjusting settings when battery is low.
faq.q3: Is my privacy secure? Can others see all my perspective recordings?
faq.a3: You have complete control over each perspective recording. By default, all recordings are private and only visible to you. Others can only see them when you actively choose to share. You can precisely control who can see your content, when they can see it, and how long they can see it.
faq.q4: On which devices can I use Memory Capsule?
faq.a4: Memory Capsule supports iOS and Android platforms and is compatible with most smartphones and tablets. We're also developing a version compatible with smart glasses to provide a more convenient perspective recording experience.
faq.q5: How do I upgrade to Pro or Family plan?
faq.a5: In the app, click "Profile" -> "Subscription Plans", select the subscription plan you want, and complete the payment. The subscription takes effect immediately, and you can enjoy premium features right away.
faq.q6: Can I export perspective recordings to other applications?
faq.a6: Yes, you can export perspective recordings to standard video or image formats for use in other applications or platforms. Pro and Family plan users can export higher quality content.
